ai.harmony.ravel.analysis.security

Class SecurityTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.harmony.ravel.analysis.security.SecurityTransformation

  • public class SecurityTransformation
extends java.lang.Object
    Apply the result of security analysis by transforming the IR and tagging the spaces with the operations they need to perform Created by gcampagn on 2/21/17.
